scripts.prebuild: curl -L "https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1Cp9E_0M8o4vsORETK9hRx86BI4lq6fgM" -o public/stats_data.csv && curl -L "https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1l2WPDbMFdRMHzOBN5U7QW4dBtq18OEng" -o public/bar_chart_data.csv && curl -L "https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1gXwFGGea85PCCiX4f8M865wnmYNcuAIL" -o public/bubble_chart_data.csv && curl -L "https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1tmkxdYTdjPR1Lf4dWqchM_cc9gvnOw_S" -o public/radar_data.csv
